response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the impact it can have on your operations, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $14,500. This is a special discount considering its worth to you, aiming to make it more accessible while ensuring we receive a fair return for our efforts and investment. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14500}
